verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

If <WH3588> a soul <WH5315> sin, <WH2398> and commit <WH4603> a trespass <WH4604> against the LORD, <WH3068> and lie <WH3584> unto his neighbor <WH5997> in that which was delivered him to keep, <WH6487> or <WH176> in fellowship, <WH8667> <WH3027> or <WH176> in a thing taken away by violence, <WH1498> or <WH176> hath deceived <WH6231> <WH853> his neighbor; <WH5997>

Or <WH176> have found <WH4672> that which was lost, <WH9> and lieth <WH3584> concerning it, and sweareth <WH7650> falsely; <WH5921> <WH8267> in <WH5921> any <WH259> of all <WH4480> <WH3605> these that <WH834> a man <WH120> doeth, <WH6213> sinning <WH2398> therein: <WH2007>

Then it shall be, <WH1961> because <WH3588> he hath sinned, <WH2398> and is guilty, <WH816> that he shall restore <WH7725> <WH853> that <WH1500> which <WH834> he took violently away, <WH1497> or <WH176> <WH853> the thing <WH6233> which <WH834> he hath deceitfully gotten, <WH6231> or <WH176> <WH853> that <WH6487> which <WH834> was delivered him to keep, <WH6485> <WH854> or <WH176> <WH853> the lost thing <WH9> which <WH834> he found, <WH4672>

Or <WH176> all that <WH4480> <WH3605> about which <WH834> he hath sworn <WH7650> <WH5921> falsely; <WH8267> he shall even restore <WH7999> it in the principal, <WH7218> and shall add <WH3254> the fifth part <WH2549> more thereto, <WH5921> and give <WH5414> it unto him to whom <WH834> it <WH1931> appertaineth, in the day <WH3119> of his trespass offering. <WH819>

And he shall bring <WH935> his trespass offering <WH817> unto the LORD, <WH3068> a ram <WH352> without blemish <WH8549> out of <WH4480> the flock, <WH6629> with thy estimation, <WH6187> for a trespass offering, <WH817> unto <WH413> the priest: <WH3548>

And the priest <WH3548> shall make an atonement <WH3722> for <WH5921> him before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068> and it shall be forgiven <WH5545> him for <WH5921> any thing <WH259> of all <WH4480> <WH3605> that <WH834> he hath done <WH6213> in trespassing <WH819> therein.
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Command <WH6680> <WH853> Aaron <WH175> and his sons, <WH1121> saying, <WH559> This <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> of the burnt offering: <WH5930> It <WH1931> is the burnt offering, <WH5930> because of <WH5921> the burning <WH4169> upon <WH5921> the altar <WH4196> all <WH3605> night <WH3915> unto <WH5704> the morning, <WH1242> and the fire <WH784> of the altar <WH4196> shall be burning <WH3344> in it.

And the priest <WH3548> shall put on <WH3847> his linen <WH906> garment, <WH4055> and his linen <WH906> breeches <WH4370> shall he put <WH3847> upon <WH5921> his flesh, <WH1320> and take up <WH7311> <WH853> the ashes <WH1880> which <WH834> the fire <WH784> hath consumed <WH398> with <WH854> the burnt offering <WH5930> on <WH5921> the altar, <WH4196> and he shall put <WH7760> them beside <WH681> the altar. <WH4196>

And he shall put off <WH6584> <WH853> his garments, <WH899> and put on <WH3847> other <WH312> garments, <WH899> and carry forth <WH3318> <WH853> the ashes <WH1880> without <WH413> <WH4480> <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> unto <WH413> a clean <WH2889> place. <WH4725>

And the fire <WH784> upon <WH5921> the altar <WH4196> shall be burning <WH3344> in it; it shall not <WH3808> be put out: <WH3518> and the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH1197> wood <WH6086> on <WH5921> it every morning, <WH1242> <WH1242> and lay <WH6186> the burnt offering <WH5930> in order upon <WH5921> it; and he shall burn <WH6999> thereon <WH5921> the fat <WH2459> of the peace offerings. <WH8002>
The fire <WH784> shall ever <WH8548> be burning <WH3344> upon <WH5921> the altar; <WH4196> it shall never <WH3808> go out. <WH3518>

And this <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> of the meat offering: <WH4503> the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> shall offer <WH7126> it before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> before <WH413> <WH6440> the altar. <WH4196>

And he shall take <WH7311> of <WH4480> it his handful, <WH7062> of the flour <WH4480> <WH5560> of the meat offering, <WH4503> and of the oil <WH4480> <WH8081> thereof, and all <WH3605> the frankincense <WH3828> which <WH834> is upon <WH5921> the meat offering, <WH4503> and shall burn <WH6999> it upon the altar <WH4196> for a sweet <WH5207> savor, <WH7381> even the memorial <WH234> of it, unto the LORD. <WH3068>

And the remainder <WH3498> thereof <WH4480> shall Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> eat: <WH398> with unleavened bread <WH4682> shall it be eaten <WH398> in the holy <WH6918> place; <WH4725> in the court <WH2691> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> they shall eat <WH398> it.

It shall not <WH3808> be baked <WH644> with leaven. <WH2557> I have given <WH5414> it unto them for their portion <WH2506> of my offerings made by fire; <WH4480> <WH801> it <WH1931> is most holy, <WH6944> <WH6944> as is the sin offering, <WH2403> and as the trespass offering. <WH817>

All <WH3605> the males <WH2145> among the children <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> shall eat <WH398> of it. It shall be a statute <WH2706> forever <WH5769> in your generations <WH1755> concerning the offerings of the LORD made by fire: <WH4480> <WH801> <WH3068> every one <WH3605> that <WH834> toucheth <WH5060> them shall be holy. <WH6942>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

This <WH2088> is the offering <WH7133> of Aaron <WH175> and of his sons, <WH1121> which <WH834> they shall offer <WH7126> unto the LORD <WH3068> in the day <WH3117> when he is anointed; <WH4886> the tenth part <WH6224> of an ephah <WH374> of fine flour <WH5560> for a meat offering <WH4503> perpetual, <WH8548> half <WH4276> of it in the morning, <WH1242> and half <WH4276> thereof at night. <WH6153>

In <WH5921> a pan <WH4227> it shall be made <WH6213> with oil; <WH8081> and when it is baked, <WH7246> thou shalt bring it in: <WH935> and the baked <WH8601> pieces <WH6595> of the meat offering <WH4503> shalt thou offer <WH7126> for a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

And the priest <WH3548> of his sons <WH4480> <WH1121> that is anointed <WH4899> in his stead <WH8478> shall offer <WH6213> it: it is a statute <WH2706> forever <WH5769> unto the LORD; <WH3068> it shall be wholly <WH3632> burnt. <WH6999>
For every <WH3605> meat offering <WH4503> for the priest <WH3548> shall be <WH1961> wholly <WH3632> burnt: it shall not <WH3808> be eaten. <WH398>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> Aaron <WH175> and to <WH413> his sons, <WH1121> saying, <WH559> This <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> of the sin offering: <WH2403> In the place <WH4725> where <WH834> the burnt offering <WH5930> is killed <WH7819> shall the sin offering <WH2403> be killed <WH7819> before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068> it <WH1931> is most holy. <WH6944> <WH6944>

The priest <WH3548> that offereth it for sin <WH2398> <WH853> shall eat <WH398> it: in the holy <WH6918> place <WH4725> shall it be eaten, <WH398> in the court <WH2691> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>

Whatsoever <WH3605> <WH834> shall touch <WH5060> the flesh <WH1320> thereof shall be holy: <WH6942> and when <WH834> there is sprinkled <WH5137> of the blood <WH4480> <WH1818> thereof upon <WH5921> any garment, <WH899> thou shalt wash <WH3526> that whereon <WH834> <WH5921> it was sprinkled <WH5137> in the holy <WH6918> place. <WH4725>

But the earthen <WH2789> vessel <WH3627> wherein <WH834> it is sodden <WH1310> shall be broken: <WH7665> and if <WH518> it be sodden <WH1310> in a brazen <WH5178> pot, <WH3627> it shall be both scoured, <WH4838> and rinsed <WH7857> in water. <WH4325>
All <WH3605> the males <WH2145> among the priests <WH3548> shall eat <WH398> thereof: it <WH1931> is most holy. <WH6944> <WH6944>

And no <WH3808> <WH3605> sin offering, <WH2403> whereof <WH834> any of the blood <WH4480> <WH1818> is brought <WH935> into <WH413> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> to reconcile <WH3722> withal in the holy <WH6944> place, shall be eaten: <WH398> it shall be burnt <WH8313> in the fire. <WH784>
